website_summaries.verdict: With an impressive tiger face on the top, these gloves are almost as tough as they look.
pros: Palms use premium non-slip spandex and microfiber
Ergonomic palm design enhances abrasive resistance and protects palm
Available in blue, black or red
cons: Best for children age 8 and under

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 7 yr old nephew who adores fingerless gloves. He wants to be a Bounty Hunter so all Tough Bounty Hunters must have fingerless gloves. I wish they had of been made more durable,but for the price what should I expect? The strings were hanging so it wasn't hemmed. I'm not sure if they will last a week with this boy because he is quite the Dennis the Menace type,lol..I got the X-Small and they fit me, but I have tiny hands for a grown woman too! They do have the adjustable velcro straps and were comfortable. Cute monster design on the top.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves Them and Wears Them Everyday
customer_reviews.text: It was my 6 year old's dream to own fingerless gloves. I hate them since they get filthy so quickly. I'd give them 2 stars because they wash so easy and they are excellent quality. But they are my son's bacteria farm and he gives them 5 stars. Maybe I'd give the sticky things 1 star because they have lasted much longer than expected as well as retained their color and stitching through dozens of washes. Unfortunately, my son stands by 5 stars because of what he describes as awesome color and design that are comfy to wear while he uses the restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kyahn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, thin, fingerless gloves for outdoor activities!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, who is 8 years old, loves gloves, and he particularly loves red gloves, and he believes gloves are a must-have for bicycling and riding his dirt bike, in addition to all sorts of pretend play, including sword-fighting, and power rangers moves. He is very specific about what he wants and has about a dozen different gloves (not including any winter gloves.) So when he got these, he loved them! They fit just right. They have the right amount of flexibility and he didn't have a fingerless pair before for summer cycling. They are super thin and he says very comfortable. They will keep his hands free of scraps and cuts in the summer for sure!
customer_reviews.author: joanies

customer_reviews.title: Protected my kid's palms when she wiped out on gravel.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about these initially because although they look cool there isn't much padding on the palm. However, they work great; my kid used these while biking on gravel, wiped out and got cut up except for her palms which were protected by the gloves. The gloves were unscathed.
customer_reviews.author: muibien

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son when he climbs the ropes in school. I really like that they are small enough and they fit him perfect! He is 7, and these are just the right size. They have different choices in colors, but I choose the black; he loves them! He even wears them biking, on the monkey bars, and rock climbing. These are great because they are easy washed and ready to go for the next adventure! I am going to order a few more pairs for spares! These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: They..well..fit like a glove! Sorry, couldn’t resist. But seriously they seem well-made and my 6 year old LOVES them and he would not take them off since I gave them to him about 4 hours ago. Did I mention that he is sleeping with them on!!! Hopefully they are durable. I bought them to protect his hands from all those monkey bars! I would say my son has slightly larger than average hands for his age and they fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 5 year old son. He picked these out cause he likes the wolf design and the color, they look well made. Haven’t used them while riding his bike yet but he’s excited to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves for kids gloves
customer_reviews.text: We like to take our kids on adventures, such as long bike rides, kayaking. I have always found it hard to find a well fitting glove for a 5-7 year old that are not too hot. These fit perfect and pertect my little guys hands from getting blisters in the middle of a lake.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymac

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the design, and they have rubber like grips on the palm which is nice. However the craftsmanship isn't very good. He's had about a week, and the stitching is coming undone (I've already had to sew one part after the first wear) Unfortunately I'm not seeing an option here to "contact seller"
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these gloves, however, he is 13 with big hands, so these gloves did not fit. These gloves are more suitable for kids at ages 10 and below, as the title says. I just didn't pay attention. My 15 year daughter could fit the gloves and she is bigger and heavier than him. He is skinny but at that age, his feet and hands are just big.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Just know they are small - best suited for kids 5-8 years old.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the description these are for "children", I assumed they would fit both my children. However, these gloves are small. My 11 year old could not get his hand in the gloves, but my 7 year old could. However, he will probably not fit them in another year or so. They are really designed for 5-8 year olds. Aside from the size, they seem to be decent gloves for the purpose I bought them for (skating and biking). Something to give the hand a bit of protection without the bulkiness of many other gloves. I gave lower stars based on the sizing issue and that the description should be reflect an age range versus generalized terms.
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these at first sight BUT, they are very cheaply made. He has worn them a handful of times and there is now a hole at the base of the thumb and the ends of the fingers are fraying. I would not waste my money if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry T

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 5 year old son to go along with a new bike for his birthday. I accidentally ordered 2 pair and intended to return the second pair until my 7 year old niece was obviously disappointed she didn't also have a cool pair of fingerless gloves to wear. They fit both kids great, are great for riding (and falling).
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but fit is a little large
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old son is in the 90th percentile for size. He wears a size 6 for clothes and size 1 in shoes. These gloves are good quality but the fit is a little large. He can still wear them and will eventually grow into them. I would recommend it but just be aware of the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Gemonthego

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them, but they won’t last.
customer_reviews.text: My boys (9 and 6) are obsessed with these. They love wearing them even when not riding their bike because they look cool. However they are not going to hold up long. The red pair started to fray a bit already. But for the price and enjoyment they are getting it’s worth the price. If you want something that will last this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy busy Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are overpriced for the quality. I bought two sets. The fabric is coming unraveled right out of the package. My kids have been waiting for them, so I am not returning them. They fit my 8 year old but are pretty tight on my small 10 year old. Cool look though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but a little small
customer_reviews.text: The gloves came and were nice. They are for my 10- year old son. However, they seemed a bit tight and definitely won’t be used for very long. I think the price was a little high for these gloves. I would say up to age 8
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K.

customer_reviews.title: WAY too small!!
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay too small. Ridiculous. Super cute gloves but way too small for my son, and even a little too tight for my 4 year old daughter. Not sure who these are supposed to fit, but my kids have average size hands for their age. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Foster

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo picked these out with his bday money- they worked perfect and he wore them everywhere (even when not on his bike lol) for 2 days straight!
customer_reviews.author: R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: came apart with hours
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit my son perfect. He put them on the moment they arrived, but in just a few hours of wearing them part of the velcro came completely off one glove, I sewed it back on and he said the other glove was coming apart...it was an easy fix, but it shouldn't had to have been with it not even being wore a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! My 8 year old has autism and wears gloves without fingers all the time so I purchased these because they look cool too! He loves them! Never takes them off! Nicely made! Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves these. Wears them everywhere. He’s on smaller side ( 5-6 size) They fit his hands perfect
customer_reviews.author: Be1bob

customer_reviews.title: Breaking after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I think my son used these maybe 5 times and they are comig apart. Otherwise we like them... I will try to sew them back.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves fingerless gloves and usually cuts the fingers off the cheap knit kinds. Love that these are thin enough to ventilate and not cause stinky hands.
customer_reviews.author: Iceprincess

customer_reviews.title: Super Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these, he wears them everyday as he bikes to school! They were the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and they fit well, he is 11 yrs old. They are very thin which is good for riding a bike so he can hold onto the bars better and not slip when pressing the brakes.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit but not durable
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and my son loved wearing them but within two days the Velcro strap broke off. Not great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nicely made! Too bad my son lost them after ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nicely made! Too bad my son lost them after a month of wearing them. I washed them multiple times but these gloves didn't shrink or really change in its appearance or fit. My son loved wearing them and was so bummed he lost them.
customer_reviews.author: Akiko Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for boys
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 and loves these gloves! He wanted them for riding his bike but he wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Renee G

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit my 8 year old son perfectly and he loves to wear them. In fact, he wore them for 2 days straight and would have kept them on if we didn't make him take them off to sleep. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Renard

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to protect kids hands while riding. Very light material but its held up so far, bought 2 pair.
customer_reviews.author: SDJ50504

customer_reviews.title: Terrible durability
customer_reviews.text: After using them about 5 times. Completely destroyed. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: 6 yr old loves them - good fit with room to grow
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He doesn't actually use them for anything, just thinks they are cool. He is 6 and they fit him well but he still has plenty of room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyBuffetClub

customer_reviews.title: Ripped before first use!
customer_reviews.text: Velcro ripped off before even the first use. Just buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: AaronSr

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: Fit somewhat small on my 11 yr old whom is small for his age. Ordered two sets but only received one, never got a reply about the fact only one set came in and never got a refund for the pair that didn’t. Overall quality was nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Bayes

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fit my 10 year old sons hands well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: beautiful and size fit, my son likes it very much
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 6 year old grandson.A little room to grow but not to much .
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bullock

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great quality for the price. They come various colors to please any child's preference. They are used frequently and have held up nicely to falls during bike rides and through numerous washes.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: We got for my 8 year old for climbing gloves ...
customer_reviews.text: We got for my 8 year old for climbing gloves. He has NOT taken them off yet. LOVES them. Has not gone climbing yet- but can attest that they help him eat cereal :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: These gloves were perfect. They protected my son's hands and he likes ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were perfect. They protected my son's hands and he likes wearing them. They are made well and the wolf looks neat. In fact, I can barely get my son to take them off, he wants to wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Halloween costume for my son. He is still wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit, which is good. Both tore within 20 mins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love them. They use them for gymnastics, playground equipment, and other play activities where protecting the hands are imperative. They now each have several pair !!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old was so disappointed when we got these. They were way too tight. They fit my 6 year old !
customer_reviews.author: cory80

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gloves for Rock Climbing & More
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect for our 6 year old granddaughter. She went camping where she was introduced to rock climbing and they worked great! Love the fact that they leave her fingertips free. Fit perfectly. All the other girls asked where she got them.
customer_reviews.author: SJCGRANDMA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: small for my 8 years boy hands. But he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly the size/fit for my slim but tall seven year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the fit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the fit. Was scared it would be too big for my 4 year old, but they are perfect with a little room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: great for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: great for my 6 year old. Quality isn't up to par with Specialized or other higher end brands, but for the price, can't beat this. also happy to spend less now knowing he will out grow it within a year
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but run small
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these but they just fit him and he's outgrow them soon. He's eight.
customer_reviews.author: wallacesmum

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son takes on a whole new persona with these on. We have to limit his wear and he’s even been grounded from them for a few days. We’ve bought multiple pairs because he wears them down after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fadule

customer_reviews.title: Good for football too.
customer_reviews.text: These got my 8 yr old perfect with some room to grow. I was looking for fingerless gloves for my 8 yr old to practice football at recess. We didn't want really good football gloves for school. He also uses his gloves for long bike rides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My little boy loved!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for an Ash costume. My little boy loved!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie L. V. Davis

customer_reviews.title: these are great for his back yard ninja
customer_reviews.text: fit our seven year old well ,he is average size not small boned or big boned,these are great for his back yard ninja course
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: We bought 2 pair! My boys love them!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest son wanted fingerless gloves. I was worried they wouldn't fit well. He is 6, they fit perfect and he loves them. They are nice, good quality. We would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the gloves for my 9 old but it fits my 3 yr old. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: SK-MICKENS

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for play
customer_reviews.text: Just what my 6 year old was wanting for his birthday, slightly big on him, but small enough for him to still wear comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: annabelle02

customer_reviews.title: Even though my 7 year old said they felt good on his hands
customer_reviews.text: Even though my 7 year old said they felt good on his hands, the finger holes were a bit small and the wrist hole was a bit large. They do serve their purpose and my son said they felt good.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Hovestadt

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my 5 year old son, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old son, they might be a bit big but he did not care and loves them. No issue with them staying on or anything, there is a strap that keeps them in place.
customer_reviews.author: kewgood

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little non-slip bumps started falling off after like 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: L. Black

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson LOVES these. Nice quality and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old who absolutely loves them...he loves to dress up & wanted fingerless gloves. Good value for the price...can't rate comfort bc I am obviously not the one who wears them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome for my little mountain biker! Definitely order bigger though.

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding grip and comfort for my ten year old when he is on his ninja line course!

customer_reviews.title: Three happy kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Kiddos are jazzed with these gloves - wear em when they ride their bikes & scooters - purchased 3 pairs & all kiddos are happy!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son wore them to bed he liked them so much

customer_reviews.title: Cute gloves, fit well
customer_reviews.text: These fit my eight year old perfectly. I got them for him to ride his bike, so that he wouldn’t hurt the palms of his hands when he falls off.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not truly non skid (for monkey bar)
customer_reviews.text: Had bought for my daughter, who loves to monkey bar and keep hurting her palms, but this gloves she rejected as it slips on metal bars.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter - she really likes them!

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited about these and used his allowance money to buy them. We had them for one hour and both gloves ripped open at the elastic seams on the cuff. He’s crushed. What a disappointment.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He's 12 and they fit him great.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 10 year old son. He’s a smaller boy so I thought these gloves would be perfect. Nope, they are super tight on my 4 year old daughter. They are too small!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: She was happy with the fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these gloves for my daughter. She was happy with the fit. Unfortunately my son lost them a week later. Will have to purchase another pair soon.

customer_reviews.title: Great!

Aside from the size, they seem to be decent gloves for the purpose I bought them for (skating and biking). Something to give the hand a bit of protection without the bulkiness of many other gloves. product_meta.title: Freehawk Kids Cycling Gloves,Non-Slip Ultrathin Children Half Finger Bicycle Cycling Breathable Gloves Roller-Skating Gloves for Fishing, Cycling, Roller Skating and Climbing
product_meta.description:
Freehawk Kids Cycling Gloves - Perfect gloves for children in outdoor activities. 
♪ Ideal for children multisports like tactical activities, hiking, camping, climbing, bicycle riding and roller-skating activities. 

FEATURE 
♫ Perfect to prevent kids’ palm from injury during activities. 
♫ All products are created from exquisite workmanship. 
♫ It is in beautiful ergonomic design which ensures comfy wearing. 
♫ Helps to remove sweat faster and provides excellent anti-slip service. 
♫ With unique design, they are fashionable and offer professional protection for your hands. 
♫ Adjustable strap with hook and loop closure, help protect wrists better when activities. 
♫ With non-slip idiosome design in the palm to enhance abrasive resistance and protect palm well. 

AVAILABLE COLOR 
☺ Blue/Black/Red. 

FREE SIZE 
♣ Suitable for the palm width of 5-7cm /1.97-2.76in. 

MATERIAL 
☺ Spandex and Microfiber. 

PACKAGE INCLUDE 
√ 1 x Pair of Children Half Finger Gloves. 

NOTE 
▲ Please allow slight deviation for the measurement data. 
▲ The real color of the item may be slightly different from the pictures shown on the website caused by many factors such as brightness of your monitor and light brightness.




PRODUCT DETAILS
